top_comments.comment: Money is an issue that everyone has for a better and luxurious life, life was hard for me until I started trading bitcoin and am now earning $20,000 per week.
I quit my job in USA because I was tired of working to death.  Carrying a beeper for 1 week out of 5 was intolerable for no salary compensation.
I wonder how vaccine mandates factor into this
